titleInfo.title: Performance - Chair-ish The Night benefiting STARS - 2012-11-16 -

mods.abstract: Benefit concert for STARS with Vince Gill and Friends from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 16, 2012. Special guests include Sheryl Crow; Keb' Mo'; Natalie Hemby; Chad Warrix;

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
